summary: Adds the house Riverside to Falkreath
descriptionHtml:
This mod ads my own player house to Falkreath. It lies just ontop the hill next to the Hall of the Dead, nest to the little river. Wich has given the house the name Riverside.

To gain acsess to the house you need to get the key to the front door. Doing this you need no sneak inside the Jarls Longhouse in Falkreath and grab the key from the Stewards bedchambers.

Once inside the house you will find a armory/display room-thingie. Bookshelves and some storage.
On the second level you will find the living area. Here you will not only find a loyal companion waiting for you but also a mini-quest. This will not pop up in your quest log, wich means you will haveto do some olf fashion tracking to finish it.

Behind the door you will find the bedroom. Here you will find even more storage, a mannequin and an alchemy + enchanting table.

Fully navemeshed.

*Due to the recent update for Skyrim, I will not be able to fix or add anything to this mod. If there are any glitches or bumps, there is nothing I can do. This also means I never got the chanse to make the bookshelves active, allthough there arnt that much space for that though.

Anyhow, I hope youll enjoy it.

/W
author: Wylda
